text:
A Samajwadi Party MLA’s brother allegedly shot dead a man following a quarrel after their vehicles brushed against each other during overtaking near Tribhuvan Nagar in Dhanepur area here, the police said on Monday.

The incident occurred on Saturday night when some people were returning from a marriage function and their vehicle hit the car of Annu Paswan, who is the brother of the ruling SP MLA from Balrampur Sadar, Jagram Paswan.

The police said both the sides got into a heated exchange of words and in a fit of rage Annu allegedly fired at Jairam Yadav (40), who died on the spot.

While Annu fled from the spot, his brother Pappu and a relative, Angad, went home in another car which they allegedly smashed to show that they were attacked, the police said. An FIR has been registered against Annu, Pappu and Angad. The police have seized the vehicle and are trying to apprehend the accused who are absconding, Superintendent of Police Pradeep Kumar Yadav said.

Meanwhile, locals blocked the Lucknow-Gonda highway, demanding the arrest of the accused and compensation for the victim’s family.- PTI
title: Man shot dead by SP MLA’s brother in Uttar Pradesh road rage case
